mainContent.heading: What is the Featured Collection Section?
paragraphs: The Featured Collection section allows you to display selected Shopify collections in a visually organized layout that draws attention to key products.
It is commonly used to highlight best sellers, new arrivals, or seasonal items, helping customers navigate directly to products that matter most.
Designed for clarity and performance, this section works well on homepages and landing pages without overwhelming visitors.

features.title: Collection Selection
features.description: Choose any Shopify collection and control how many products appear per row and overall.

features.title: Product Details
features.description: Show or hide product information such as title, vendor, variants, and pricing.

features.title: Promotional Card
features.description: Display a featured card with heading text and a call-to-action button.

features.title: Layout & Positioning
features.description: Adjust spacing, alignment, and placement to fit your store layout.
